CustomField.formula: ShippingStreet & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(ShippingStreet)), BR(),'') & ShippingCity & ', ' & ShippingState & ' ' & ShippingPostalCode & IF(OR(NOT(ISBLANK(ShippingCity)), NOT(ISBLANK(ShippingState)), NOT(ISBLANK(ShippingPostalCode))), BR(),'') & ShippingCountry
CustomField.label: Complete Shipping Address
